content.question: The writer is considering deleting “(e.g., community service...and academics)” in sentence 7. Should the writer keep or delete “(e.g., community service...and academics)”?

choices.label: Keep it, because it exemplifies what these potentially better alternatives might be.
Keep it, because it is necessary to understand the values of part-time work.
Delete it, because it distracts from the message the writer is communicating.
Delete it, because it repeats information that was introduced earlier in the passage.

content.answer: Keep it, because it exemplifies what these potentially better alternatives might be.

skill.text: Skill 8.B: Write sentences that clearly convey ideas and arguments.
